@SilentCJ wrote:

Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

DAMN =([/quote]

Do you have a FileOperations.java file named correctly?

item.title: 100% Perfect Godsword Standing, Walking, Running, Attacking, and Blocking Anims
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“X Fucker X, post:506, topic:296291”]yo, i got the same prob as N A S I R please man help us both out i know how annoying it is when u compile it says no errors u get so fucking happy thinking u succeed then when u run client u get that annoying error plz CJ help me

it says exactly like NASIR’s post and this:

Read Error: ./cache/.file_store_32/anims/74.dat
Error: loaderror Requesting animations 65
urlstream

help needed…

add my msn plz im on it all time so its easier to help me there, plz dude nasjj@hotmail.com

the guy over me, and the guy under me and me… we have same freaking prob plz cj help us i rly want those anims they look so cool[/quote]

Stop moaning, it’s your problem because you use shitty clients like bluur and delta, they’re the only clients it doesn’t work on because the cache is placed differently.
All the error means is that it can’t find the 74.dat, damn…

Mr. Despair:

Very good job on this SilentCJ. It works perfect for me.

Well that makes a change, somebody who actually added it properly…

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @N_A_S_I_R N A S I R
item.description:
@N_A_S_I_R wrote:

yo dude awesome tut , but hey, i got deltascape client and i did this when i try load the client
it says:

Sorry An error has accured whilst loading DeltaScape

To fix this try the following (in order):

1:try closing ALL open web-browsers windows , and reloading

2:try clearing your web-browsers cache from tools->internet options

3:try using a different game-world

4:try rebooting your computer

5:try selecting a different version of Java from the play-game menu

please answer dude ur the FREAKING best if u can help me i swear to god, ty mah bro
